etymology.description: Uncertain; proposals include an ideogram of a level/flat surface or a pictograph of a leveling tool/board.
etymology.interpretation: Scholars generally see it as emphasizing horizontality and evenness, aligning with core meanings like level and even. This sense later extended to calm/peace and is also used as a Chinese surname Píng.

examples.chinese: 平先生今天来访(平先生今天來訪)。
我认识一位姓平的老师(我認識一位姓平的老師)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ rènshi yí wèi xìng Píng de lǎoshī.
examples.english: I know a teacher whose surname is Ping.

examples.chinese: 平女士来自北京(平女士來自北京)。
